meta.Agreement: Use of the APIs and any related data will be subject to the terms of the Open Licence and subject to terms and conditions

Notes: With no annual fee for the first 12 months, the Barclaycard Select credit card can help manage cash flow and expenses. It comes with: you could pay no annual fee every year if you qualify for our Fee Waiver,19.9% Purchase Interest Rate, an initial 6-months interest free purchase period, up to 56 days interest free after the initial 6 month period. To keep your 0% rate, just make sure you stay within your credit limit and make at least your minimum payment on time each month. It's also important that you clear your balance in full after the interest-free period ends, or you'll be charged interest. Plus insurances and added protection for your business - Cardholder Misuse and Purchase Protection. Limitations and exclustions apply

Unless we tell you otherwise, your minimum payment will be the highest of the following: • £5 (or the full statement balance if it’s less than £5) • An amount equal to any interest, default fees or account fees that have been added to your account since your last statement, plus 1% of the remaining statement balance
Returned payment, for example, a failed Direct Debit, cheque or other payment (for each returned payment)

If a payment you make is less than your total statement balance, we’ll use it to reduce the balance with the highest interest rate first. If any of the payment is left over, we’ll use it to reduce the lower-rate balances. If you have more than one promotional balance at the same interest rate, we’ll use your payment to reduce the balance with the promotional rate that ends first.
UK based businesses only.

TradingHistoryEligibility.Textual: Business turnover or new business plan must exceed £10,000 per year
Notes: Business is not bankrupt or in bankruptcy proceedings. Existing financial commitments are not overdue and have been managed well over the last 12 months. UK based businesses only. Directors and employees must be at least 18 years of age.
Upon Application

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Fee Waiver
Notes: If you spend £6000 or more on purchases or cash across the entire account during the previous year, on annual renewal all annual account fees will be waived for the following year.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: 6 Months Interest Free at Account Inception
Notes: 6 months interest free on purchases when the account is opened. Minimum monthly payments are still required.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Transfer to Bank
Notes: Ability to move money from card credit limit to Bank account. A fee is charged and the transferred balance then becomes interest free for 3 months. Available to customers on a promotional basis. Subject to status, qualification criteria and banking at Barclays.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Promotional Cash Flow
Notes: Ability to select a further interest free period for purchases. A fee is charged with new purchases interest free for 3 months. Available to customers on a promotional basis. Subject to status and qualification criteria.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Business Rewards
Notes: A series of discounts and offers available from participating merchants made available to card account.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Card Holder Misuse/Purchase Protection
Notes: Standard card insurance.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: Online Account Management
Notes: View statements, transactions, credit limits. Make payments and download management reports.

FeatureBenefitItem.Name: My Controls
Notes: Customise card acceptance for employees, instantly suspend cards, turn on and off international spending, cash and online spends and preselect merchant category spends for individuals.
Per Transaction.
Cash Withdrawal general fee of 3% (minimum £3) will also apply per transaction.
Applied per transaction.
Copy of transaction details £5 per item (we will not charge if the copy shows we made a mistake in charging the amount to your account)
Copy of a statement £5

CoreProduct.ProductDescription: No annual fee for the first year, then annual fee waived thereafter based on spend criteria. Initial 6 month interest free period on purchases plus insurance and added protection services.
Notes: Purchase Rate 19.9 percent
If you spend £6000 or more on purchases or cash across the entire account during the previous year, on annual renewal all annual account fees will be waived for the following year.

When you travel abroad on business, it's good to know you're covered for almost any eventuality. But travel insurance can be expensive. So why not save money with our enhanced travel insurance option, which is included in the annual fee of £100 per year for your first card, and then just £75 per card, per year for additional cards. It comes with: 14.9% Purchase Interest Rate, an initial 6-months interest free purchase period, up to 56 days interest free after the initial 6 month period. To keep your 0% rate, just make sure you stay within your credit limit and make at least your minimum payment on time each month. It's also important that you clear your balance in full after the interest-free period ends, or you'll be charged interest. 0.5% cashback on purchases, £400 max per year. Save 2% on foreign exchange fees. Membership of Priority Pass VIP Airport lounge with first two visits included per year. Additional visits £15 each. Plus insurances and added protection for your business - Enhanced Travel, Cardholder Misuse and Purchase Protection. Limitations and exclustions apply

Unless we tell you otherwise, your minimum payment will be the highest of the following: • £5 (or the full statement balance if it’s less than £5) • An amount equal to any interest, default fees or account fees that have been added to your account since your last statement, plus 1% of the remaining statement balance
Returned payment, for example, a failed Direct Debit, cheque or other payment (for each returned payment)

If a payment you make is less than your total statement balance, we’ll use it to reduce the balance with the highest interest rate first. If any of the payment is left over, we’ll use it to reduce the lower-rate balances. If you have more than one promotional balance at the same interest rate, we’ll use your payment to reduce the balance with the promotional rate that ends first.
UK based businesses only.

CoreProduct.ProductDescription: Provides Cashback on business purchases, enhanced travel insurance, airport lounge access and savings on foreign exchange rates
Notes: Purchase Rate 14.9 percent
£75 for each additional card

Managing a business means looking after the pounds and pence, that's why we've designed Barclaycard Flex credit card to help. It comes with: no annual card fee, 24.9% Purchase Interest Rate, an initial 3 months' interest-free purchase period and up to 56 days interest free after the initial 3 month period. To keep your 0% rate, just make sure you stay within your credit limit and make at least your minimum payment on time each month. It's also important that you clear your balance in full after the interest-free period ends, or you'll be charged interest.

Unless we tell you otherwise, your minimum payment will be the highest of the following: • £5 (or the full statement balance if it’s less than £5) • An amount equal to any interest, default fees or account fees that have been added to your account since your last statement, plus 1% of the remaining statement balance
Returned payment, for example, a failed Direct Debit, cheque or other payment (for each returned payment)

If a payment you make is less than your total statement balance, we’ll use it to reduce the balance with the highest interest rate first. If any of the payment is left over, we’ll use it to reduce the lower-rate balances. If you have more than one promotional balance at the same interest rate, we’ll use your payment to reduce the balance with the promotional rate that ends first.
UK based businesses only.
